IPMI HP BL460c Gen8

Overview

simple template to monitor IPMI sensors for HP blade server BL460G8

Author

Dmitry Lavrukhin

Macros used

There are no macros links in this template.

Template links

There are no template links in this template.

Discovery rules

There are no discovery rules in this template.
